comment: ScoMo has announced a new Royal Commission into these fires . Who better to head it than someone who has been on the front line since September and who has spoken with s of people affected ? <URL>
amr:
# ::snt ScoMo has announced a new Royal Commission into these fires . Who better to head it than someone who has been on the front line since September and who has spoken with s of people affected ? <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / announce-01
            :ARG0 (o / organization
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "ScoMo"))
            :ARG1 (c / commission
                  :ARG1-of (n2 / new-01)
                  :mod (r / royal)
                  :prep-into (f / fire
                        :mod (t / this))))
      :snt2 (h / have-degree-91
            :ARG1 (a2 / amr-unknown
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / head-01
                        :ARG1 c))
            :ARG2 (g / good-02
                  :ARG1 a2)
            :ARG3 (m2 / more)
            :ARG4 (s / someone
                  :ARG1-of (b / be-located-at-91
                        :ARG2 (l / line
                              :mod (f2 / front))
                        :time (s2 / since
                              :op1 (d / date-entity
                                    :month 9)))
                  :ARG0-of (s3 / speak-01
                        :ARG2 (p / person
                              :ARG1-of (a3 / affect-01))))))

comment: That hazard reduction burns were necessary and that cattle should be allowed to graze in National Parks to reduce the fuel load . It's all in the Court documents about Wayne West's et . al . struggle to get reparations from the relevant bodies .
amr:
